document_data.name: Naeryk Andolphyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Naeryk Andolhyn''' was a noble in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance: He was sharp-featured, with a forked beard that was waxed to stay that way.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|80-82|5}}
document_data.History: On the original day of the [[Council of the Dragon]], after sending poison smoke into [[Castle Obarskyr]] to force a delay, the [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] enslaved the mind of Naeryk Andolphyn while the latter was at a tavern. On the day after, Naeryk Andolphyn had Lord [[Danthalus Blacksilver]] ride to court in his coach; the two made small talk about the things they saw from the coach, such as a noble arrived with very much an army of his own, a coach pulled by what appeared to be [[lion]]s, how mad the [[War Wizards]] would be about that, and cheeses and wines from far away, such as [[Sembian soft sharpsnip]].
